name: Princéton: Bluff Version
description:
Experience an exciting adventure with Pomp Circumstance and Princeton, the Powdered Sugar Horse, along the beach and boardwalk of Bluff City's Kingfish Pier!

Princeton: Bluff Version is a Pokémon fangame for Friends at the Table's Bluff City: America's Playground. It was made in RPGMaker XP using Pokemon Essentials, as part of the Secret Samol fan exchange, for Elenor Einhorn on twitter.

Depending on your familiarity with America's Playground or Pokémon, the game can take 20-40 minutes to play; but you can save your game and pick it up later to continue your journey!

To play the game, download the file below, unzip, and run!
